channel.title: iHaxx Server - Version 2.1.0 - Development Progress
channel.description:
[center][img]http://ihaxx.net/images/styles/ambient-lightingv4-gold/images/logo.png[/img]
Hello MoparScape,
Some users here may remember me back in 2007, most people here probably don't know me as i havn't been active in the community for a long while now, Over the past couple of weeks i've been starting the development to my Version 2.1.0. Anyways i'm gunna cut straight to the point rather than explain a life story.
[b]So all users are aware, i am looking for some coders to join the team. Please no time wasters or 5minute wonders as this is a serious project. If you are intrested then add my msn; Root@iHaxx.Net or just drop me a personal message.[/b]
Feature & Update List;
Skills;
Added 90% Firemaking [Need To Add Clipping] Added 90% Woocutting Almost 100% Cooking Done Almost 100% Fishing [Few Missing Spots] Added 90% Herblore [Few Pots Left To Add] Added 10% Agility [Only Added Gnome Course So Far]
Misc; Black Mark System + Message Centre [ [url=http://m.ihaxx.net/]PREVIEW HERE[/url] ] Forum Implemation Highscores Implemented [ [url=http://ihaxx.net/highscores/index.php]PREVIEW HERE[/url] ] New Quest Tab [Shows Server Info] Added Flax Picking Added Antique Lamp [Gunna Use For Reward]
[b]Much Much More, Will Update Soon...[/b]
Latest Pictures; [IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/welcome.png[/img] [IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/AttackEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/StrengthEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/DefenceEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/RangeEmote.png[/img] [IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/PrayerEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/MagicEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/RuneCraftEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/HitPointEmote.png[/img] [IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/AgilityEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/HerbloreEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/ThievingEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/CraftingEmote.png[/img] [IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/FletchingEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/MiningEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/SmithingEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/FishingEmote.png[/img] [IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/CookingEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/FireMakingEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/WoodCuttingEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://iHaxx.Net/Advertise/FarmingEmote.png[/img] [img]http://ihaxx.net/Offense.png[/img] [img]http://ihaxx.net/Loading%20Bar.png[/img] [img]http://ihaxx.net/Login%20Box.png[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2ccxf7d.gif[/img] [img]http://ihaxx.net/Advertise/Rushing.png[/img] [img]http://ihaxx.net/Advertise/SaradominGWD.png[/img]
[b]Many More Pictures To Come So Please Be Patient![/b]
[b]THIS THREAD IS NOT YET COMPLETE SO PLEASE BE PATIENT I HAVE MANY PICTURES TO BE ADDING[/b]
Thanks, Diesel Server Developer & Mananging Director[/center]

item.title: iHaxx Server - Version 2.1.0 - Development Progress
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

I Vain I:

I’m not stubborn. You’re only showing off the site in am aspect of the message center. After showing off, you clearly said you made most of your site from scratch; which is untrue. Now I’m not blatantly saying you made none of this, because I’m not doubting you did. I’m only saying you over-exaggerated with the aforementioned posting body.

Your such an idiot, At what point did i say developed my vBulletin Board, apart from adding my categorys & Plugin-ins, i then implemented the vbulletin template into the highscores and soon converting the message centre. And you say i’m only showing off the message centre because it’s a part of the development, since when has anyones forums become part of a “development”. Just stop posting in my thread. Don’t even reply.

Read full topic

item.title: iHaxx Server - Version 2.1.0 - Development Progress
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

Kono-chan:

So why is your website currently VB if you showed that nice account center?

No… the message centre is in another place, this is development not a full release. I’ve still got links to add all over and like i said above the message centre can be previewed HERE

Echo_:

Looks pretty sick so far, good luck with your server ;D

Thanks alot

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Elux link=topic=473316.msg3465876#msg3465876 date=1294884548]
Of course. Most of it was made scratch even my highscores apart from some css.
I’ve been building iHaxx since 2007.
[/quote]Most of the site was made from scratch, by you?

Is that what you’re saying?

Because, I’m pretty sure you didn’t make vBulletin, or the site template.[/quote]

I’ve explained enough on my thread if you can’t interpret whats been said thats your problem, and if you got a problem take it else where (Stubborn much).

Read full topic
